docs.title: Polars Time Series Extension
docs.text:
Welcome to the documentation for the Polars Time Series Extension.

Documentation: https://drumtorben.github.io/polars-ts

Source Code: https://github.com/drumtorben/polars-ts

docs.title: 📖 Overview
docs.text: The Polars Time Series Extention offers a wide range of metrics, feature extractors, and various tools for time series forecasting.

docs.title: 🎉 Contributing
docs.text:
1. Fork the repository.
  2. Create a new feature branch.
  3. Submit a pull request with your changes.
